sentences.en: A lorry blew a tyre and careered into them.
sentences.cn: 一辆货车爆胎了，向他们猛撞了过去。

sentences.en: A tyre blew out when the coach was on its way.
sentences.cn: 长途汽车在半路上爆胎了。

sentences.en: He jacked the car and changed the back tyre.
sentences.cn: 他用千斤顶把车顶起来更换后胎.

sentences.en: He saw a dagger sticking in his car's tyre.
sentences.cn: 他看到一把匕首插在他汽车的轮胎上。

sentences.en: His back tyre just went pop on a motorway.
sentences.cn: 他的后胎在高速公路上砰的一声爆了。

sentences.en: His car rolled over after a tyre was punctured.
sentences.cn: 一只轮胎被扎破后，他的车翻了个底朝天。

sentences.en: I had a flat tyre (= all the air went out of it ) on the way home.
sentences.cn: 回家的路上我的轮胎瘪了。

sentences.en: I tried to pump up my back tyre.
Other than blowing up a tyre I hadn't done any car maintenance.
sentences.cn: 除了给轮胎充气外，我没做过任何汽车保养。

sentences.en: Remove wheelnuts, let down tyre, put on spare.
sentences.cn: 拧下车轮螺母，放掉车胎的气，换上备用胎。

sentences.en: Some glass on the road punctured my new tyre.
sentences.cn: 路上的玻璃刺破了我的新轮胎.

sentences.en: The bicycle tyre blew out at a previously damaged point.
sentences.cn: 自行车胎在以前损坏过的地方又爆开了.

sentences.en: The nearside front tyre had been slashed.
The spare tyre ’s in the boot.
The tyre is guaranteed never to puncture or go flat.
sentences.cn: 这种轮胎保证永远不会被扎破或撒气。

sentences.en: We managed to prise off the lid with a tyre lever.
sentences.cn: 我们设法用卸外胎用的撬棍撬开了盖子.

phrases.tran_cn: 气胎；空心轮胎；充气轮胎
子午线轮胎（等于radial-ply tyre，radial，radial tire）

trans.tran_en: a thick rubber ring that fits around the wheel of a car, bicycle etc
